name: Atlaskit
tagline: Tools for processing and merging anatomic atlas label volumes
body:
### Atlas Kit

Toolkit for manipulating and merging 3D anatomical atlas images. These images are assumed to contain integers representing different region labels.

Functions include:

- smoothing all, some or one label
- merging two versions of an atlas with appropriate label locking and version control
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
